nodes.text: Stangg was a male Gamorrean member of The Shroud's syndicate. During the Galactic War, a conflict fought between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, he was stationed at one of the Shroud's hidden bases, where he was confronted and killed.
Stangg appears as a boss in the Shroud's storyline, appearing either on Quesh if playing as a Republic character, or on Dromund Kaas if playing as an Imperial character.
